## Test Plan

## Merging

To merge, comment one of the following:
- `/merge fix` — patch bump (bug fixes, `0.0.x`)
- `/merge feat` — minor bump (new features, `0.x.0`)
- `/merge feature` — minor bump (alias for feat)
